sentences.english: AMERICA'S political priorities have undergone a breathtaking about-turn.
sentences.chinese: 美國政治上優先考慮的事情已然經歷了一個大轉變。

sentences.english: When all of war's dusts and clamours settle.
sentences.chinese: 戰場上的塵土已然蒼白。

sentences.english: Critics have come out on all sides of Bernanke's highly accommodative monetary policy.
sentences.chinese: 伯南克高度寬鬆的貨幣政策已然被批評地體無完膚。

sentences.english: But I am done with apple-picking now.
sentences.chinese: 然而此刻，採收蘋果於我，已然足夠。

sentences.english: Already, colleges and universities are making entrepreneurship the fastest-growing field of study on campus.
sentences.chinese: 研究創事業精力已然成爲大學裏成長最快的一個領域。

sentences.english: Now it's at the center of the zeitgeist.
sentences.chinese: 而如今它已然成了時代精神的中心。

sentences.english: Morning is when I am awake and there is a dawn in me.
sentences.chinese: 清晨，在我甦醒之時，曙光已然照臨內心。

sentences.english: Mr Liu admits the market has changed.
sentences.chinese: 劉洪園承認，市場已然發生變化。

sentences.english: Loud laugh has become a healthy activity like jogging and Yuga.
sentences.chinese: 大笑，與慢跑和瑜伽一樣，已然成爲健康運動。

sentences.english: Royal Dutch Shell already owns a 10 percent stake in Arrow's international business.
sentences.chinese: 皇家殼牌已然擁有亞羅公司國際業務10%的股份。

sentences.english: The lavender had not yet bloomed, but roses were in flower;
sentences.chinese: 薰衣草尚未盛開，但玫瑰已然綻放。

sentences.english: O storm, embodied, rising, careering with swift steps along the beach!
sentences.chinese: 啊，暴風雨已然成形，高漲，沿着海岸飛奔。

sentences.english: Bogotá, its capital, has emerged as a role model of urban reinvention.
sentences.chinese: 首都波哥大已然成爲城市改造的樣板。

sentences.english: There have been many proposals, but all share two features.
sentences.chinese: 提案已然數不勝數，但總歸有兩個共同點。

sentences.english: Being bossy is out and teamwork is in.
sentences.chinese: 專橫已然過時，團隊合作纔是正理。

sentences.english: Mr Abe has studiously suppressed a debate about raising the consumption tax.
sentences.chinese: 安倍已然刻意地壓制了一場關於提升消費稅的爭論。

definition: to progress (or increase, change etc) day by day/more (or better etc) with each passing day
